modName: Armor of the Old Gods aka Forsworn Armor - Sabrecat
summary:
A new, higher resolution version of the Armor of the Old Gods a.k.a. Forsworn Armor.
Removed feathers, applied Sabrecat snow pelt textures. Female only!
descriptionHtml:
Japanese Translation Patch by aohige: [url=http://www.4shared.com/archive/3Ca2J8z4/Armor_of_the_Old_Gods_aka_Fors.html]http://www.4shared.com/archive/3Ca2J8z4/Armor_of_the_Old_Gods_aka_Fors.html[/url]

[size=3]
[color=lightblue]Armor of the Old Gods - Sabrecat v2.1 (by Volek)[/color][/size]

Adds a unique, higher resolution version of the Armor of the Old Gods. Removed feathers, applied Sabrecat snow pelt textures. This version does not replace the standard forsworn armors nor the armor you get after the prison quest. 

v2.0 items have the same enchantments as the original Armor of the Old Gods.
v2.1 removes the enchantments. Untested, please comment if  enchanting the items doesnt work.

Female only! Comes in 4 different variants:

-black amulet
-white amulet
-no amulet
-no bag/no amulet.

You can buy all variants plus matching boots, gauntlets and helmet from Arnleif and Sons in Markarth.

This mod is not compatible with other mods that add stuff to that merchant (afaik, there is none)

Installation:
Extract the contents of the zip file to your Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/ folder, overwrite files when asked. Activate the esp with the Skyrim Launcher.

I\'d like to thank Rekicker for the support!

No need to ask for permission to use in other mods, just give credit to me and Rekicker.
author: Volek
